# Contributor PR Template

## Name
[Your Full Name]

## Role / Position
[Your Role]

## Changes
- [List usage of specific changes you made]
- [e.g., Added new profile for ...]
- [e.g., Fixed typo in ...]

## Checklist
- [ ] Markdown formatted correctly
- [ ] No sensitive data (email, phone, etc.)
- [ ] Profile validated via script (`./scripts/validate_profiles.ps1` or `./scripts/validate_profiles.sh`)
- [ ] Commit messages follow conventional format (e.g., `feat: add profile`)
- [ ] I have signed off on my commits (if required)
